mapper.sql: Id, AccountId, CityId, IsEnable, CreateBy, CreateTime, UpdateBy, UpdateTime

update.foreach: IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM AccountCityRelation with(nolock) WHERE accountid = #{item.accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND CityId = #{item.cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) BEGIN update AccountCityRelation set IsEnable=#{item.isenable,jdbcType=INTEGER},UpdateBy=#{item.updateby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} WHERE accountid = #{item.accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND cityid = #{item.cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER} END ELSE INSERT INTO AccountCityRelation ( accountid, cityid,CreateBy, UpdateBy) VALUES ( #{item.accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},#{item.updateby,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )

mapper.select: SELECT acr.cityid FROM [AccountCityRelation] acr with(nolock) JOIN PublicProvinceCity ppc with(nolock) on acr.CityId=ppc.code WHERE acr.AccountId=#{userId} and acr.IsEnable=1
